# querySubscriptionOptions

**Instance Property**

Options that define the behavior of the subscription.

## Declaration

```swift
var querySubscriptionOptions: CKQuerySubscription.Options { get }
```

## Discussion

Set the value of this property at initialization time. When you configure a query-based subscription, use one of the following values:

- [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKQuerySubscription/Options/firesOnRecordCreation]
- [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKQuerySubscription/Options/firesOnRecordUpdate]
- [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKQuerySubscription/Options/firesOnRecordDeletion]

If you don’t set an option, the system throws an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/invalidArgumentException].

## Accessing the Subscription Search Parameters

- **predicate**: The matching criteria to apply to records.
- **CKQuerySubscription.Options**: Configuration options for a query subscription.
